Name: Trinity VR
About the game: Trinity VR is the pilot episode for a full 5 episode VR series. Trinity VR is a highly innovative, 12-minute, live action, fully immersive, interactive virtual reality experience using big-movie visual effects. In a future where humans have long been extinct, the last surviving androids fight a final war for freedom against an all-powerful Singularity, their Godâ€¦ Live the action. Feel the emotions. Who am I? What role do I play in the story? You will want to experience Trinity more than once in order to explore the full VR world and make sure you don't miss any of the interactive elements!
